title: Complete 40/40 Non-Baseball N28 Allen & Ginter Set for Sale
author: lampertb

posts.post_title: Complete 40/40 Non-Baseball N28 Allen & Ginter Set for Sale
posts.post_content:
Selling off my N28 complete non-baseball set.  Look back at my previous posts to see that this is legit.  The economy is forcing my hand; I already sold all of the baseball cards several months ago via PWCC.

I am also including the pictured Allen & Ginter Virginia Brights Crop of 1887 pack.  It is in excellent condition, except for some writing on the exterior.  The inner shell is in great shape for the age.

I am asking $1,150 shipped.  

The cards are raw and low-grade.  There is definitely some trimming on certain cards, including Annie Oakley, and back damage from scrapbooking abounds.  Net54 only allows me to upload low-res photos, so if you email me, then I can provide many more higher-resolution pictures for you to see on your own terms.

Email is best,

Richard
